Package etomica.modules.entropylottery

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationZero
    Configuration that simply puts all the Atoms at 0, or -0.5 if the box size is even (which makes the entropy lottery binning happy).
    DataSourceProbabilityDensity  
    DisplayBoxCanvas1DBins
    Class used to define canvas onto which configuration is drawn
    EntropyLottery  
    EntropyLotteryGraphic  
    EntropyLotteryGraphic.Applet  
    EntropyProcessor
    Calculates the entropy of an incoming probability density using Stirling's approximation.
    MCMoveAtomAdjacent
    Monte Carlo move that moves an atom by +/- 1 unit in a random dimension.
    MeterEntropy
    Calculates the entropy of the distribution of Atoms in a Box using Stirling's approximation.
    ModifierDimensions
